text: Kari K. Wahlgren (born July 13, 1977) is an American actress and comedian. She is known for her role as Tigress in Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness notable roles in Nickelodeon, Disney, Cartoon Network from various. She has done voices for many video games. Wahlgren was born in Hoisington, Kansas. == Animated television == *Dexter's Laboratory - Additional voices *Nutri Ventures - Additional voices *Puppy Dog Pals - Additional voices *Animaniacs - Additional voices *The Powerpuff Girls (1998) - Additional Voices *The Powerpuff Girls (2016) - Additional voices *The Loud House - Additional voices *The Super Hero Squad Show - Additonal voices *The Fairly OddParents - Additional voices ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Kansas
title: Kari Wahlgren
